h1: Calories in a Slice of Tomato
assumptions: Medium tomato slice (~20 g), raw, fresh, skin-on, no added seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by tomato variety, ripeness, size of slice, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One slice of tomato contains about 4 calories and is low in fat with some fiber.

faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of tomato?
faqs.a: About 4 calories for a standard 20 g slice.

faqs.q: Does a tomato slice have fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, around 0.2 g of dietary fiber per slice.
